certifications.subtitle: DataCamp
certifications.title: Intro to Python for Data Science

recommendations: Lalit Reddy “Sabya was a key member of the Special Projects team at HighRadius. He did an excellent job on a variety of topics - talent strategy, scaling operations, IPO readiness - the list goes on. What stood out to me was his ability to move from one topic to another, gain depth quickly and deliver actionable insights rapidly. He did all this while maintaining a super positive and humble attitude - and was fun to be around.”

Harshad Shrikhande “Sabyasachi is one member whom you would definitely want to have in your team. His constant endeavours to come up with out-of-the box solutions to challenging problems makes him a prized asset. Sabya is able to apply transfer learning to the fullest making him truly a Data Scientist. He can articulate his point of view extremely well and it also speaks volumes of his clear line of thought. His PySpark skills are pretty commendable and capable of building data products at scale. In all, I have had a very pleasant experience of working with Sabya on a plethora of projects in the company.”

organizations.title: ShARE - Global Student Think Tank, IIT Kharagpur Chapter
organizations.description: ShARE is a global community of students that specialize in providing consulting advice to industries. I joined as a Junior member in the Strategy Segment and designed the marketing campaign for BuyHatke's new price comparison app.As a Senior member I guide other Junior members to complete their respective projects now. In addition, I am also serving as the Vice President and helping collaborate cross-college projects.

organizations.title: Engineers Without Borders India, Kharagpur Chapter
organizations.description: EWB-India has been established as a non-profit society under the Society’s Act to involve engineers and other professionals with special or general skills, in a movement of constructive change. It is inspired by an urgent concern for accelerating sustainable rural development, assisting in capacity building both in rural and urban communities of India, protecting the country’s natural resource base and working across national boundaries for social and economic justice and responsible use of technology.

honors_and_awards.title: Valeo Innovation Challenge 2015
honors_and_awards.description: Semi Finalists, Top 24 out of 11,321 teams from across 73 countries. Awarded 5000 euros to prototype the proposed TRANSIT(Traffic Regulation using Automated Network for Safe and Intelligent Transport) system for cities with a traffic congestion issue.
